resources.string: Google did not invent the Android.\n Android was created in 2003 by four entrepreneurs who founded the start-up Android Only two years later, Google bought the company for $ 50 million
Satellites in space based on Android, as part of a project NASA has sent in 2013 three cheap photo satellites based on Nexus devices Such satellite price was $ 3,500
Google CEO Eric Schmidt has served as a director at Apple, but after Google began to develop and push the Android and compete with IOS, He had to retire in 2009
How great Android is?\n Android has 1.4 billion active users
